titles.title: Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Congressional declaration of bourbon whiskey as a distinctive product of the United States.
Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Congressional declaration of bourbon whiskey as a distinctive product of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Recognizes the 50th anniversary of the congressional declaration of bourbon whiskey as a distinctive U.S. product.
